actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A resolution to provide for a 50-percent reduction of the amount of funds available to, of the number of individuals employed as staff for, and of the amount of office space and number of telephone lines available for use by, any committee of the House of Representatives during the Ninety-sixth Congress.

summary.text: Limits to 50 percent over the amount expended during the 95th Congress, second session, any increase by any committee of the House of Representatives during the 96th Congress in following categories: (1) the available funds for investigations and inquiries; (2) the funds available for the hiring of staff personnel; (3) the number of individuals employed; (4) the amount of office space; and (5) the number of telephone lines.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for a 50-percent reduction of the amount of funds available to, of the number of individuals employed as staff for, and of the amount of office space and number of telephone lines available for use by, any committee of the House of Representatives during the Ninety-sixth Congress.
